00144 void RedBlackTree::reset()
00145 {
00146    while (tree != nullSentinel)
00147       dequeue();
00148 }
00149 
00150 bool RedBlackTree::isEmpty()
00151 {
00152    return tree == nullSentinel;
00153 }
00154 
00155 RedBlackNode* RedBlackTree::seekMin()
00156 {
00157    RedBlackNode *minNode = tree;
00158 
00159    if (minNode != nullSentinel)
00160       while (minNode->leftChild != nullSentinel)
00161          minNode = minNode->leftChild;
00162 
00163    return minNode;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void RedBlackTree::initNullSentinel()
00167 {
00168    nullSentinel->color = BLACK;
00169    nullSentinel->leftChild = nullSentinel;
00170    nullSentinel->rightChild = nullSentinel;
00171    nullSentinel->parent = nullSentinel;
00172 }

00247 inline void
00248 RedBlackTree::reset()
00249 {
00250    //clear();
00251    while ( ! empty() ) {
00252       pop();
00253    }
00254 }

00262 inline RoutingNode*
00263 RedBlackTree::dequeue()
00264 {
00265    // For use as a bucket.
00266 /*     if ( empty() ) */
00267 /*        return NULL; */
00268 /*     iterator it = begin(); */
00269 /*     RoutingNode* node = it->second; */
00270 /*     erase(it); */
00271 /*     return node; */
00272    RoutingNode* topNode = top().second;
00273    pop();
00274    return topNode;
00275 }

00277 inline void
00278 RedBlackTree::enqueue(RoutingNode* node)
00279 {
00280    //insert(pair<uint32, RoutingNode*>(node->getEstCost(), node));
00281    // Priority queue dequeues the most expensive first.
00282    push(make_pair(MAX_UINT32-node->getEstCost(m_map), node));
00283 }
